message:
SYSTEM: AnaIglesiasMolina-MBC_TFM.pdf: Página 12
UPM / Japan collaboration
Introduction
12
Ontology-based data access technology applied to Bio2RDF
§
Change the methodology to access the data in Bio2RDF from 
RDF materialisation to virtualisation with OBDA. To achieve that:
1. Create the mappings for the datasets of Bio2RDF
2. Develop a methodology with the minimum interaction from the user 
that deals with the heterogeneity of the data
3. Overcome the problems the actual methodology of Bio2RDF 
presents
Objectives
speaker: SYSTEM
